text: uṅkaḷiliruntē avaṉ uṅkaḷukkāka ōr utāraṇattai eṭuttuk kūṟukiṟāṉ; uṅkaḷ valakkaram urimaippaṭuttik koṇṭavarkaḷil (aṭimaikaḷil) evaraiyum, nām uṅkaḷuk aḷittiruppa(tāṉa campat)til uṅkaḷuṭaṉ paṅkāḷikaḷāka ākkik koṇṭu atil avarkaḷuṭaṉ camamāka irukkiṟīrkaḷā? Uṅkaḷaip pōṉṟōrukku payappaṭuvataippōl avarkaḷai payappaṭukiṟīrkaḷā? Ivvāṟākavē nām nam attāṭcikaḷai cintittuṇarum camūkattiṟku vivarikkiṟōm
